title: Keep/Trade/Cut Decisions + Go Big or Go Home, SOS Tips - Fantasy Football Podcast for 6/2
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, Andy, Mike, and Jason make tough Keep/Trade/Cut decisions! Plus, how much does strength of schedule factor into fantasy football drafts and rankings? And finally, another edition of “Best Ball Breakdown” presented by Underdog Fantasy. Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for June 2nd, 2022.

The 2022 Ultimate Draft Kit is available NOW

(02:10) - Strength of Schedule
(09:00) - Keep / Trade / Cut
(09:10) - Clyde Edwards-Helaire, Miles Sanders, Travis Etienne
(16:35) - TJ Hockenson, Dallas Goedert, Zach Ertz
(22:45) - CeeDee Lamb, Travis Kelce, D’Andre Swift
(30:50) - Mac Jones, Trevor Lawrence, Justin Fields
(38:10) - Best Ball Breakdown
(42:10) - Dynasty Draft Regrets

Connect with the show:
Subscribe on YouTube
Visit us on the Web
Support the Show

Follow on Instagram
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
